DOC.detailed_description: Agreement CNAP pressure invasive pressure evaluate dependent hemodynamic variable achieve PICCO monitor . Hypothesis : Low cardiac output volume status high vascular resistance affect accuracy CNAP . Body mass index age may impact accuracy PPV measure non-invasively basis volume-clamp technique .
DOC.criteria: need invasive blood pressure measurement age 18 emergency cardiac dysrhythmia
